review_text: You get 12 small tumblers in this order, they are just as they appear in the picture. They are sturdy, IKEA quality, they will last years. I like the matte texture that acts as a grip agent on the bottom half of each cup.
product_name: Ikea Kalas 101.929.56 BPA-Free Tumbler, Assorted Colors, 6-Pack, Set of 2
